news_header: A gasoline tanker crash in Nigeria resulted in at least 94 deaths and 50 injuries.
news_text: In Jigawa, northern Nigeria, a gasoline tanker crashed late Wednesday night, leading to a massive explosion. The driver lost control, causing the tanker to fall. As residents attempted to gather fuel from the fallen tanker, an explosion occurred, resulting in a fire that killed 94 people on the scene and injured 50 others.
